nodes.text: Keffan was a male individual who lived during the Imperial Era. At some point, he was robbed outside a bazaar on the Outer Rim planet Crucival. In 4 BBY, the Opaline Creed member Pira Ten recounted the incident to her friend Hazram Namir when asking if he had encountered similar trouble at the establishment. By that time, Keffan could still not move his fingers.
Keffan was mentioned in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
